k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s) 


k, s = int(input()), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

# -----Answer-----

k = int(input())

k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s)


def file(k, s):
    if k > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:k] + '...')


file(3, '123456789')
k, s = input(), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')



def main():
    k, s = input(), input()
    if k > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:k] + '...')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
